task: How to Host an 11 Year Old's Birthday Sleepover
step: Buy cheap pillows and blankets.

Drag a long, clean table or bench into the bathroom and set out nail varnish, hairbrushes and combs, dishes of marshmallows or popcorn or fruit on toothpicks of a plate.

task: How to Organize a Hello Kitty Birthday Party
step: Don’t touch that kitty: this is similar to the hot potato game except that you will use a Hello Kitty toy.
